sentences.sContent: And they do not expect just to shake hands with him.
sentences.sContent_eng: And they do not expect just to shake hands with him.
sentences.sCn: 这些领导人期望的不仅仅是和他握握手。

sentences.sContent: It was love from my mother, and now I could shake hands with others naturally.
sentences.sContent_eng: It was love from my mother, and now I could shake hands with others naturally.
sentences.sCn: 那是来自妈妈的爱。 现在，我已经可以很自然地和别人握手了。
